name: Clarice Adventure
description:
Clarice Adventure is a nice 2D platform game.
Like the Classic jump and run games !

Help Clarice to completed her quest !

It features

  • 20 Levels.
  • HD Graphics.
  • Avaliable for Android (Also TV).
  • Available for Android. 
  • Support Gamepad.

How to Play

Use the awsd or arrow keys to move the  character, and use the space key to jump!

Comments.
